subject: Re: is require a keyword ?
body:
Garg, Mayank IN BOM SISL \u5199\u9053:
>  
> 
> Hi Guys,
> 
>             I was going thru a script which had the the lines:
> 
>  
> 
> require Exporter;
> 
> require DynaLoader;
> 
>  
> 
>  
> 
> what does these lines mean
> 

You may take a look at:
perldoc -f require
